meanings: the Judicial Research and Training Institute

vlive.korean: 예전에 같은 학교에 다녔던 동창이 사법고시 패스를 했다는 거예요. My friend told me one of our friends passed the bar exam. 듣기 View video LEE DONG WOOK : [Full]이동욱의 On the air (LEE DONG WOOK's On the air)
vlive.english: My friend told me one of our friends passed the bar exam.

examples.korean: The inquiry acknowledges failings in the judicial system. 발음듣기 그 조사는 사법 제도상의 결함들을 인정하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The inquiry acknowledges failings in the judicial system. 발음

examples.korean: the country’s creaky legal machinery 발음듣기 국가의 낡은 사법 조직 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the country’s creaky legal machinery 발음

examples.korean: The case is subject to judicial review. 발음듣기 그 사례는 사법부의 심리를 받아야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The case is subject to judicial review. 발음

examples.korean: Portugal has lodged a complaint with the International Court of Justice. 발음듣기 포르투갈이 국제사법재판소에 소송을 제기했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Portugal has lodged a complaint with the International Court of Justice. 발음
